title: Episode 93 - W.E.B. Du Bois
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
In this episode, we examine the life of WEB Du Bois one of the Civil Rights leaders of the early Cold War era.

Please check out our sponsor for this episode and get one month free at The Great Courses Plus:
